name: R.Ai.GUN (GameJam)
description:
Long ago, a great tree descended from the stars, bringing machinekind neverending peace and prosperity.

The ones above ruled supreme in perfect armony, while bathing themselves in the holy tree roots.

However, the lower ones coveted the power of the tree, bringing a brutal war that destroyed the upper ones until only one was left.

Armed with a Railgun, you have to fight for your life.

Godspeed you, hero.

===============

Made for the Global Gamejam in my city, my idea was to try and mix both vampire survivors and Monolith, I kinda wish i had more time to work into it.

Credits:

Jesus Herrera - Lead Dev, Artist, Animator, Designer.

Uziel Sabalza - Composer
